minecraft:emitter_initialization.creation_expression: v.Kc = 1; v.Kl = 0.14; v.Kq = 0.07; v.r = 0; v.g = 0; v.b = 0; v.max_scale = math.min(64, (-v.Kl + math.sqrt(v.Kl*v.Kl - 4*v.Kq*(v.Kc - 16 * 256/5)))/(2*v.Kq)); v.scale = 0;

minecraft:particle_initialization.per_render_expression: v.r = q.actor_property('deferred:color_r')/255; v.g = q.actor_property('deferred:color_g')/255; v.b = q.actor_property('deferred:color_b')/255; v.scale = math.min(64, (-v.Kl + math.sqrt(v.Kl*v.Kl - 4*v.Kq*(v.Kc - math.max(v.r, math.max(v.g, v.b)) * 256/5)))/(2*v.Kq));
